name: attack_func
description: The function that will be called when the <%= doc_class_name %> interacts with another <%= type 'Entity' %> and registers a successful hit.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.desc: The <%= doc_class_name %> that will be executing the <%= type 'CardAction' %>.

parameters.name: other
parameters.desc: The <%= type 'Entity' %> that was hit by this <%= doc_class_name %>.
